-- FAQ -- 1. I tried to register claim, but it said that my policy does not include this type 2. I can\'t create drone insurance, what should I do? 3. My application crashed, what now? The problem is that you your policy does not include this type of claim. If you want to change your policy please contact us in \"Contact\" tab menu. First of all, check if you have correct date and policy number. Drone insurance have to included in your policy. If you want to change your policy, contact in \"Contact\" tab in left menu. Please contact the developers in \"Contact\" tab. We will help you with your problem as soon as possible.
-- Car Accident Help -- What should I do? 1) Try to be as calm as possible 2) Turn on the hazard warning lights 3) Equip your warning vest and set a warning triangle 50m from the car 4) If there are injured people, provide first aid and call an ambulance (tel. 155 or 112) When to call the Police? (tel. 158 or 112) 1) Someone is injured or death will occur 2) There is a damage to any of the vehicles including the transported belongings exceeding CZK 100,000 3) Third party property is damaged If neither of the above points occur, write down a European Accident Record with the other participant You can now report this accident with this application by pressing the button bellow
-- Toolbar -- Log Out Toolbar Title Insurances Dashboard Claims Cannot be empty
-- Left Menu -- User Name User Email Open Closed Account Profile Support Contact About us
